article_title: Hamas says more than 20,000 killed in Gaza.
sentence: Hamas  says  more  than  20,000  killed  in  Gaza.

article_title: Hamas says more than 20,000 killed in Gaza.
sentence: The  Hamas  government  media  office  has  put  out  a  statement  on  the  Telegram  messaging  app  saying  that  the  number  of  people  killed  by  Israeli  strikes  in  Gaza  has  now  exceeded  20,000.
